Module.Content:
<canvas id="qr"></canvas>
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/qrious/4.0.2/qrious.min.js"></script>

<style>
    body
    {
        background: transparent;
        overflow: hidden;
    }
    #qr
    {
        width: __UP_rdW__px;
        height: __UP_rdH__px;
        overflow: hidden;
    }
</style>

<script>
  var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
  
  // This function is called after the gadget has been initialized.
  function onLoad() {
    
  }

  function updateSession(){
    console.log('run')
    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
        if (xhr.readyState === 4){
            var qr = new QRious({
                element: document.getElementById('qr'),
                size: prefs.getString('rdW'),
                value: 'https://sony-kiosk-remote.herokuapp.com/?reg='+prefs.getString('regKey')+'&id='+JSON.parse(xhr.responseText).id
            });
        }
    };
    xhr.open('GET', 'https://sony-kiosk-remote.herokuapp.com/session/'+prefs.getString('regKey'))+'?na=true';
    xhr.send();

}

    function onLoad() {
        updateSession();
        setInterval(()=>{
            updateSession()
        }, 30*1000)
    }

  gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(onLoad);
</script>
